mapper.insert: insert into tb_address(uid, name, province_name, province_code, city_name, city_code, area_name, area_code, zip, address, phone, tel, tag, is_default, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time) values (#{uid}, #{name}, #{provinceName}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityName}, #{cityCode}, #{areaName}, #{areaCode}, #{zip}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{tel}, #{tag}, #{isDefault}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime})
